attributes.additional_details:
why is it we have a department of health that has stood by and allow the tobacco business to teach people to smoke?
if smoking is the number one cause of death in this country, then why is smoking legal?
surely a department of health that is genuine should not permit the people they are meant to be protecting, abuse and damage their health through smoking?
why has the government done that to us?
how can the government use slogans such as we work for you when at the same time you betray us by legalizing smoking?
the reality is legalizing smoking serves the interests of the chancellor and the economy, it certainly does not benefit the public.
by allowing smoking the government is being irresponsible to say the least and it should be stopped immediatly.
